name: Ragnarok Client Archive
summary: Learn about .GRF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The contents of a Ragnarok GRF file can be browsed and extracted using GRF Factory, a free utility available at neatocool.com.

description: Compressed file archive used by Ragnarok Online, a Korean multiplayer game; includes compressed images, sounds, and other data files loaded by Ragnarok.
